text: In the 2016–17 season, USM Bel Abbès is competing in the Ligue 1 for the 22nd season, as well as the Algerian Cup. ==Squad list== Players and squad numbers last updated on 20 August 2016. Note: Flags indicate national team as has been defined under FIFA eligibility rules.
